name: Finomial Corporation
description: Developer of a cloud-based client life cycle management platform designed to connect the critical interactions between institutional and individual investors, fund managers, fund administrators, and custodians. The company's platform automates the hedge-fund subscription process, as well as offers investor analytics services, enabling clients to maximize returns on their investments, promote profitability and automate investor servicing from end to end.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based client life cycle management platform designed to connect the critical interactions between institutional and individual investors, fund managers, fund administrators, and custodians. The company's platform automates the hedge-fund subscription process, as well as offers investor analytics services, enabling clients to maximize returns on their investments, promote profitability and automate investor servicing from end to end.
